TopicTitle: Does the simple weight mod still exist? (or is there an equivelant mod)

Articles.Content: I recall there being a mod a while back that was a whole bunch of parts with specific weight values, so you could see just how much your launch vehicle could well... launch. Does that still exist (that is to say... updated)?
I think you can do that by just using the TWR of the rocket.
